title: Best Crocodile Moments in One Piece, Ranked
author: CBR Editorial
description: An article ranking Crocodile's best moments throughout One Piece, including his betrayal of Robin in the Tomb of the Kings and his battles with Luffy during the Arabasta Arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers beyond Arabasta Arc, including Marineford content

title: One Piece: Why Crocodile Remains One of the Series' Best Villains
author: Renaldo Matadeen
description: An analysis of why Crocodile continues to be regarded as one of the best villains in One Piece, examining his ruthless betrayal of Robin and his complex motivations during the Arabasta Arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Crocodile's later appearances in the series

title: Why Nico Robin Joined The Straw Hats In Alabasta In The One Piece Series
author: Hamza Butt
description: An article explaining the circumstances that led to Robin joining the Straw Hat Pirates, including her betrayal by Crocodile in Episode 123 and her subsequent rescue by Luffy.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through the end of the Arabasta Arc

title: Episode 123 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for One Piece Episode 123, including plot summary, character appearances, trivia, and production details.

title: Tomb of the Kings - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Detailed information about the Tomb of the Kings location, including its debut in Episode 123, its significance to Alabasta's history, and the events that occurred there.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through the climax of the Arabasta Arc

title: Pluton - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive article about the Ancient Weapon Pluton, including its mention in Episode 123 and the revelation that the Arabasta Poneglyph doesn't actually reveal its location.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains major spoilers about Pluton's true nature and location revealed much later in the series

title: One Piece – Alabasta Arc Recap
author: TV Tropes Contributors
description: A comprehensive recap of the entire Alabasta Arc, including detailed analysis of Episode 123's pivotal moments like Crocodile's betrayal of Robin.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains complete spoilers for the entire Arabasta Arc

title: Alabasta and Crocodile Are Still FIRE?!!? We MADE A Vtuber Review ONE PIECE!!!!
author: Rant Café Anime Podcast with Poseidon Mythos and The Anime Dude
description: A podcast episode reviewing the first half of the Alabasta Arc, discussing Crocodile as a villain, his plans for Pluton, and his eventual betrayal of Robin.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through Episode 123 of the Arabasta Arc

title: One Piece: The 10 Best Episodes Of The Alabasta Arc (According To IMDb)
author: Rei Penber
description: An article ranking the best episodes of the Alabasta Arc according to IMDb ratings. Episode 123 is noted for its high tension and the pivotal betrayal scene.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Arabasta Arc

title: Every Known Poneglyph In One Piece, Explained
author: Rei Penber
description: A comprehensive guide to all known Poneglyphs in One Piece, including the Arabasta Poneglyph read by Robin in Episode 123.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains major spoilers about Poneglyphs discovered throughout the entire series
